titleStmt.title: World Wide Diplomatic Archives Index: Dominica
Dominica

div.head: Legislation
div.p: There is no formal legislation governing the access to diplomatic records.

div.head: Location
div.p: National Documentation Centre Library and Information Services of Dominica: Kennedy Avenue, ROSEAU.
Ministry of Foreign Affairs: Government Headquarters, Kennedy Avenue, Roseau.

div.head: Procedures
div.p: For access to records pre-dating Dominica’s independence in 1978, researchers should consult the UK National Archives. For documents produced after independence, researchers should contact the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Dominica.
